role.argrole: Entity can not do or work

example.parse: CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS لفت) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM اعضاء) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الوفد))) (PP-CLR (PREP الى) (SBAR (PUNC ") (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (S (NP-TPC-1 (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_ACC البلديات)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS باتت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC عاجزة) (PP (PREP عن) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN سداد) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN التزامات) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))))))))
